NOT_IN_CLASS.desc: User is not joined to a class.

NOT_IN_CLASS_NOTE.desc: NOTE when User is not joined to a class.

CHAT_UNAVAILABLE.str: El chat ha sido deshabilitado por el profesor.
CHAT_UNAVAILABLE.desc: The teacher has disabled the ability for the student to use chat.

CHAT_WITH_TEACHER.desc: This tool allows the user to chat with their teacher.

ENTERED_CLASS.str: Ingresó a clase a las {{ timeStamp }}
ENTERED_CLASS.desc: Notify the user they have entered the class at a particular time.

ENTERED_CLASS_INTRO.str: Estás en una clase. Su instructor puede ver su trabajo.
ENTERED_CLASS_INTRO.desc: Notify the user they are in a class and the instructor can see their work.

CHAT_HISTORY_ENABLED.str: El historial de chat está activado.
CHAT_HISTORY_ENABLED.desc: Notify the user that the chat history setting is enabled.

LEFT_CLASS.str: Salió de {{ className }} a las {{ timeStamp }}
LEFT_CLASS.desc: Notify the user they have left the class at a particular time.

RAISED_HAND.desc: Notify the user they have raised their hand in the chat window.

LOWERED_HAND.desc: Notify the user they have lowered their hand in the chat window.

TYPE_MESSAGE_HERE.desc: Placeholder text where the user types a chat message.

ACTIVE_SPEAKER.desc: Shows who is currently speaking in the conference.

MULTPLE_SPEAKERS.desc: More than one speaker is currently speaking in the conference.

TEACHER_SPEAKER.desc: Shown when the teacher is the current speaker in the conference.

TEACHER_CHAT.desc: If name of teacher is not present when they send a chat message, this is the string identifying the sender.

YOU_SPEAKER.desc: Shown when the user is the current speaker in the conference.

UNKNOWN_STUDENT.desc: Shown when the name of the student in the conference is unknown.

CONFERENCE_ONGOING.desc: Shown when there is a conference in currenly session.

PARTICIPANT_AVAILABLE.desc: A conference participant is available to speak.

PARTICIPANT_BROADCASTING.desc: A conference participant is currently broadcasting.

AUDIO_SETTINGS.desc: Title for dialog box to make the audio device selection.

AUDIO_SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION.desc: On the settings dialog box, asks the user to choose their audio devices from the given choices.

TEST_SPEAKERS.desc: Button to allow the user to test their speakers with current audio settings.

MICROPHONE_DEVICE.desc: Label for the microphone device selection.

SPEAKERS_DEVICE.desc: Label for the speakers device selection.

NETWORK_ERROR_DETECTED.str: Se detectó un error de red
NETWORK_ERROR_DETECTED.desc: Notify the user a network error has occurred.

CHECK_NETWORK.str: Compruebe la conexión a Internet y asegúrese de que está en la misma red de Internet que el dispositivo del profesor e inténtelo de nuevo.
CHECK_NETWORK.desc: Ask the user to check their network settings.

RETRY_CONNECTION.desc: Ask the user to retry their network connection.

CONNECTING.desc: Tell the user the network is currently trying to connect.

LSA_CONNECTIVITY_STATUS.desc: Title for the dialog box displaying the current state of connectivity.

CONNECTED.desc: Tell the user the network is currently connected.

NOT_CONNECTED.desc: Tell the user the network is currently not connected.

LEARN_MORE.desc: Clickable link to a webpage for additional information

DOWNLOAD_LOGS.desc: Button label for the user to download debug logs to the local filesystem.

LOG_SAVE_SUCCESS.desc: Tell the user the log saved successfully.

LOG_SAVE_ERROR.str: Error al guardar el registro: {{ errorString }}
LOG_SAVE_ERROR.desc: Tell the user the log save failed and why.

DEAD_ORG_TITLE.str: El agente estudiantil de LanSchool Air está instalado en su dispositivo y ya no funciona.
DEAD_ORG_TITLE.desc: Title of dialog box explaining that the customer org is no longer recognized.

DEAD_ORG_ACTION.str: Póngase en contacto con su administrador para desinstalar.
DEAD_ORG_ACTION.desc: Direction to the user to contact their administrator.

DISMISS_BUTTON_LABEL.desc: Label for the dismiss button on a dialog.
